content.text:

content.thinking:
The user wants me to read several files and create a comprehensive Telegram message that includes all their content with clear section headers, file paths, and proper formatting (code blocks for code files, markdown for research files). This is for a "volume deployment" scenario, so it needs to be very clear and easy to copy-paste back.

content.text:
I'll read all the specified files and create a comprehensive Telegram message with everything clearly formatted for easy copy-pasting.

**Task completed!** I've compiled all research and code files into a single, comprehensive Telegram message with:
